attributes.action: Award Mary the Victoria park toilet attendant for outstanding bravery.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mary the toilet attendant at the Victoria park in Glasgow has saved the life of a young child by entering the parks water and rescuing young Joseph from drowning despite her own inability to swim and panic attacks triggered by her fear of the water.

We hear by ask the prime minister to award this women for her outstanding bravery and public service. Also to look into health & safety at the park.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
